WSGIPack
++++++++

.. contents :: 

Summary
=======

Run WSGI applications from Flows.

Get Started
===========

* Download and install from source

Author
======

`James Gardner <http://jimmyg.org>`_

Changes
=======

0.2.0
-----

2010-10-13
~~~~~~~~~~

* Upgraded to support HTTPKit 0.2.0
* Refactored into a single file

0.1.0
-----

* First version
